verbs.description: army [V: may] incorporate more civilians into its cyber teams only 20 percent of the army cyber teams are made up of civilians the army is analyzing whether that the right ratio in an environment where every uniformed servicemember is expected to be able to deploy to combat gen jennifer buckner army staffs directorate congress gen richard angle mark esper army staff directorate commander gen jennifer buckner maj gen garrett yee defense department army gen mark milley gen richard angle maj gen garrett yee cio dod french army army chief of staff cyber mission force gen mark milley secretary
